title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 276.6 - Records and reports
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 276.6 - Records and reports

State Regulations

The commissioner may, in his/her discretion, in the
determination of an appeal, take into consideration any official records or
reports on file in the Education Department which relate to the issues involved
in such an appeal. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
276.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
